extendedInfo.description: Hate the Feeling of not knowing whether or not you are giving your ferret the best care or not? Good news! Now you can with this app as it helps you learn and discover the ways to keep your ferret happy and healthy.Not only that, but this app let's you know of the latest greatest breakthroughs and tips to keep your ferret feeling its best.What you'll get with this app-How to choose the ferret that is right for you-How to protect your little friend from ferret diseases.-The importance of your ferret's diet.-Tips for setting up a bed your ferret will love!-How to groom your ferret so that he is the envy of the town. (No more ferret smell)-How to play nice with your ferret!-The smoothest and safest way to get interact with your ferret!-How you can improve the quality of your ferret's life-Tips on preparing to welcome your new ferret to the family.-Much, much more!This app is built by a group of ferret lovers and enthusiast, so you'll always have the latest and greatest ferret care ideas immediately.Grab your FREE ferret care app TODAY!

reviews.title: I am a ferret, you see.
reviews.comment: And I believe \'this\' \'app\'  sets human-ferret relations back to an earlier epoch, what our kind calls \"The age of the furious stinky weasels\". WHERE IS MY SQUEAKY DUCK?!?!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wtf?
reviews.comment: Why have an app that takes you to a suspended web page? Would give 0 stars but it wont let me. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Whatever
reviews.comment: This is not what I expect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: P.o.S
reviews.comment: I can Google this. What\'s the point in the app? Wish negative stars were possible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Loved it. Lots of good information.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolute crap
reviews.comment: Redirects to a suspended site. Don\'t waste your time.
reviews.author: A Google User
